draw2d.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 
00002 ! ======================
00003 !
00004 !   DRAW_TREE_2D 
00005 !
00006 !   Output tree structure for processing
00007 !   by GLE 
00008 !
00009 ! ======================
00010 
00011 subroutine draw2d
00012 
00013 
00014 
00015   !  Tree written to ....  tree.box2dN
00016   !  Particles       ....  tree.partsN
00017   !  Centres         ....  tree.comasN
00018 
00019 
00020   use treevars
00021 
00022   implicit none
00023 
00024   integer, dimension(nppm) :: ix, iy
00025 
00026   character(30) :: cfile
00027   character(1) :: csnap
00028   integer ic(5),jc(5),lc(5)
00029   real octx(9),octy(9)
00030 
00031   integer :: i, ip, j, ilev, isnap, ibt
00032   real :: s, xt, yt
00033 
00034   save isnap
00035   data isnap/1/
00036   !  square data
00037   data ic/0,1,1,0,0/
00038   data jc/0,0,1,1,0/
00039   data lc/1,0,0,0,0/
00040 
00041   !  coma shape
00042   data octx/-.333, -1., -1., -.333, .333, 1.,  1., .333, 0./
00043   data octy/-1., -.333, .333, 1., 1., .333, -.333, -1., 0./
00044 
00045   csnap=achar(mod(isnap,10)+48)
00046 
00047 
00048   cfile="box2d_"//csnap//".gle"
00049   write (15,'(a)') cfile
00050   open(60,file=cfile)
00051 
00052   !  initialise graphics filter
00053 
00054   write (60,'(a,2(/a),2(/a,2f13.4))') &
00055        'size 15 15' &
00056        , 'set font rm' &
00057        , 'set lwidth 0.01' &
00058        , 'begin scale ',12./xl,12./xl &
00059        , 'begin translate ',.01*xl,.01*yl
00060 
00061   write (60,'(a/a,2f13.4)') 'amove 0 0','box ',xl,yl
00062 
00063 
00064   ! parent cells - in blue, no symbol
00065   write (60,'(a)') 'set color yellow  lwidth .005'
00066 
00067   do ilev = nlev,1,-1
00068      s = xl/2**(ilev)          !  box length
00069      ! recover box coordinates of parents
00070      ibt = nlev-ilev           ! bit shift factor (0=particle node, nlev-1 = root)
00071      do j = 1,npp
00072         ix(j) = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( ishft( pekey(j),-2*ibt ),2*i,1 ), i=0,nbits-1-ibt) /) )
00073         iy(j) = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( ishft( pekey(j),-2*ibt ),2*i+1,1 ), i=0,nbits-1-ibt) /) )
00074      end do
00075 
00076      do ip = 1,npp
00077         xt=ix(ip)*s
00078         yt=iy(ip)*s
00079         write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',xt,yt
00080         write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'box ',s,s
00081      end do
00082 
00083   end do
00084 
00085   write (60,'(a/a)') 'set color red','set lwidth .005'
00086 
00087 
00088   do i=1,npp
00089      write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',x(i),y(i)
00090      write (60,'(a)') 'circle .002 fill red'
00091   end do
00092 
00093   ! map of interleaved bits 
00094   write (60,'(a)') 'set color blue lwidth .002'
00095 
00096   ilev = nlev
00097   s = xl/2**(ilev)          !  box length
00098   ! recover box coordinates of parents
00099   ibt = nlev-ilev           ! bit shift factor (0=particle node, nlev-1 = root)
00100   do j = 1,npp
00101      ix(j) = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( ishft( pekey(j),-2*ibt ),2*i,1 ), i=0,nbits-1-ibt) /) )
00102      iy(j) = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( ishft( pekey(j),-2*ibt ),2*i+1,1 ), i=0,nbits-1-ibt) /) )
00103   end do
00104 
00105 ! first point
00106   xt=ix(1)*s+s/2
00107   yt=iy(1)*s+s/2
00108   write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',xt,yt
00109 
00110   do ip = 2,npp
00111      xt=ix(ip)*s+s/2
00112      yt=iy(ip)*s+s/2
00113      write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'aline ',xt,yt
00114   end do
00115 
00116 
00117   write (60,'(a/a)') 'end translate','end scale'
00118   close(60)
00119 
00120 
00121   isnap=isnap+1
00122 
00123 end subroutine draw2d
